detail.description:
Loan Products
Rapid Cash Online Credit Loan Products
Loan period: 3, 6, 12 months installments (91-365 days)
Loan limit: ₱ 3000 - ₱ 30,000
Interest rate (maximum APR): 24% per annum
Service fee：0%

An example for a loan of ₱ 3000 with a term of 120 days, the fees charged are as follows:
Monthly interest rate：24%/12 = 2%
Monthly interest：₱3000*2%=₱60
Total monthly payment = ₱3000*2% + ₱3000 = ₱3060
Total interest: ₱3000 * (24%/360) * 120 days = ₱240
Total return fee: ₱3000 + ₱240 = ₱3240

Rapid Cash - Application for borrowing cash online, easy liquid cash without collateral, unsecured credit, get rupiah cash loans online, safe and trustworthy. As an online cash loan provider platform, Rapid Cash is a Smart Solution for your Financial Needs.

Who can borrow?
Filipino citizen
20 years and over
Have ID card and bank account

How to apply for an online loan at Rapid Cash?
1.Download Rapid Cash on APP Store.
2. Login only with your mobile number.
3. Select the online loan amount and payment period you want.
4. Upload all the requested information correctly.
5. Easy loan application approval.
6. Aged 20 years and over.

The entire loan process can be completed via a smartphone anywhere at any time. Don't worry, we have Rapid Cash! Easy online cash loans without collateral and without credit cards.

Payment Method:
SMS sent before & when due for a reminder to pay off the loan.
Payments: E-wallet, Bank transfer, RD Pawnshop\ M Lhuillier.

Why borrow credit online at Rapid Cash?
NO WARRANTY
No need for a credit card and no admin fees or other funds, apply for a cash and liquid loan to your account. High disbursement rate! Enjoy smart online credit loans without collateral without any property collateral!

INSTALLMENT LOAN
Easy online loans, long online loan tenures & can be paid in installments or in monthly installments, helping your business finances run smoothly. Only Rapid Cash has a low interest monthly installment loan. Borrow money online now, pay next month!

SAFE AND RELIABLE
Rapid Cash protects all customer data & info. Borrow cash easy online safely without collateral.

EASY AND FAST
Only by downloading the Rapid Cash application, quick reviews, easy cash loans, all processes are carried out via cellphone. Direct loans disbursed up front, free to use for your needs.

For more information, contact us at:
Email：help@rapidpeso.com
Customer Service Hours：Monday - Friday 09:00 - 18:00, Saturday 08:00-17:00
Address : 8th Floor Rockwell Business Center Tower 3, 100 Ortigas Avenue Pasig 1604 Metro Manila Pasig NRC Philippines
